com.strato.hidrive.api.dal

Interface FileInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<FileInfo>, com.strato.hidrive.api.dal.interfaces.Focusable, com.strato.hidrive.api.dal.interfaces.IGalleryInfo, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteFileInfo

    public interface FileInfo
extends Comparable<FileInfo>, Serializable, com.strato.hidrive.api.dal.interfaces.IGalleryInfo
    A entity that describes a file or folder.
